title: 10 Facts about GOOD OMENS! - Film Facts
author: AC Media & Film
comment: 11th fact: that Crowley is Aziraphale's future husband.
I think it's safe to assume that if Crowley ever had any sons he would name them Freddie and Mercury 💖

I just wanna add th fact that they made David Tenannt drive in a real flaming car.
If he dies, he dies
The passerby in the street scene who tells Aziraphale "You're better off without him" is Dan Starkey a.ka. Strax in  Dr Who :-)
Another Doctor Who thing is David's Doctor wanted to be a ginger, now he is as a demon.
description:
So Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett's weird tale of good, evil and weird scottish fellas obsessed with nipples finally gets its on screen adaptation on Amazon prime with Good Omens starring David Tennant and Michael Sheen!

So we're diving into this weird world to find 10 interesting facts about this show in this episode of Film Facts!
